record.description: University of Chicago Chancellor Lawrence Kimpton attends the Laird Bell Law Quadrangle dedication.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Original and scanned photograph is located in Series I: Kimpton, Lawrence A.: Group: no. 37. A photocopy of this image is found in Series II Laird Bell Law Quadrangle: Dedication: no. 4.Copy found in series II is a photocopy. Original is curling at the edges and can be located in series I under Kimpton, Lawrence A.: Group: no. 37
record.noteCopyright: Please credit the Chicago Sun-Times Photo.
